item.description:
Read: This is the final week of a 3-Part, practical workshop by Bill Belew: how to grow your website/blog with an emphasis on work. Come prepared to learn and do things differently and more effectively.

February 4, 2013 will be the final (week 3) of the 3-part workshop.

Go home with ALL the tools and know how you need to enhance your online visibility.

In week 3/part 3 of the workshop, you will learn the key elements of growth (content, goals, and accountability).

Cost: FREE: for members of Bill Belew's blogging network. $250 for non-members. Learn the many other benefits of being a member and find out how you can become one for just $20/month: http://billbelew.com/subscribe/

(Week 3: February 4, 2013) – The key elements of growth applied to the website

I. Critiquing content

II. Mastering formatting of content

III. Setting achievable goals for best results

IV. Establishing a means of mutual accountability and encouragement for best results.

V. Q & A

 *These same workshops will also be offered at a local university for a tuition cost of $297. However, these workshops are FREE to members of Bill Belew's blogging network. Become a member at http://billbelew.com/subscribe/ and get in FREE to these workshops.

Questions? E-mail: bill@billbelew.com

Bill Belew is a professional blogger = pays his Silicon Valley mortgage through his network of online web sites. You can do this, too. It's not easy, but it is doable. Bill Belew will teach you how in this workshop.

Bill will bring his no-nonsense style to these workshops with an emphasis on work.

Come with nothing, go home with the knowledge and infrastructure to start making money with your blog.

Questions? E-mail: bill@billbelew.com

This is one workshop series you don't want to miss! Check out Bill's testimonials from previous workshops:

“All was helpful! I was so tired this morning that I almost didn’t attend. I’m sooo glad I did.” Katie B. San Francisco, CA

“All the content was great! Very well organized and helpful. Really got my creative juices flowing.” Anita C., Campbell, CA

“Let’s just say that after attending two lectures from Bill Belew, this one for the second time (I lost my notes from the first one), I am now a die hard Bill Belew groupie!!! When Bill Belew speaks, I take good notes, and I suggest you do too!” Kevin C., Saratoga, CA
item.name: Week 3 of 3-part practical workshop: how to grow your website/blog w/Bill Belew
